Package civitas.celestis.graphics

Class Colors

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.Colors
public final class Colors extends Object
Contains utility methods and constants related to AWT Colors.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    MIN_LERP_INTERVAL
    The minimum LERP interval which when provided as the interpolation parameter t, will yield the same result as 0.

      The minimum LERP interval which when provided as the interpolation parameter t, will yield the same result as 0.

    • lerp

      @Nonnull public static Color lerp(@Nonnull Color s, @Nonnull Color e, double t)
      Performs linear interpolation (LERP) between the starting color s and the ending color e. The interpolation parameter t represents the amount of interpolation.
      Parameters:
      s - The starting color of this operation
      e - The ending color of this operation
      t - The interpolation parameter ([0, 1])
      Returns:
      The interpolated color
